actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.
Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide agencies with discretion in securing information technology and information systems.
short_title: Federal Information Systems Safeguards Act of 2016
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text:
Federal Information Systems Safeguards Act of 2016

This bill provides that executive agency actions that are necessary to restrict or prohibit access to a website which an agency determines presents a security weakness or risk to the information technology or information system under the agency's control, and any impact or implementation of such action, shall not be subject to federal employee labor-management relations requirements.

titles.title: Federal Information Systems Safeguards Act of 2016
A bill to provide agencies with discretion in securing information technology and information systems.
Federal Information Systems Safeguards Act of 2016
